sub_title: Mkt Comms & PR for the Creative Industries  | Bringing innovation and creativity to businesses | Communications Specialist | Social Media & Brand Campaigns
summary:
International Marketing Communications & PR professional with over 6 years of experience.

I'm interested in bringing creativity and innovation to businesses to leverage their social media and communications strategy. 

I'm passionate about global teams and gaining an international understanding of different markets. I've worked with brands and influencers in Ecuador, Canada, the United States, United Kingdom, and now I'm learning all about the European market. 

I'm highly skilled in content creation, copywriting, communications strategy, and event planning. 
My experience is within the creative industries as I'm passionate about this industry, and I thrive in creative environments. 

I'm interested in companies/businesses at the intersection of tech/creativity/innovation and looking to make a social impact. 

I'm starting my life in the Netherlands and looking for the next challenge that would bring me stability and professional/personal growth. 

Languages:
Spanish (Native) and English (Professional) and learning Dutch
